description:
Silky is the fairy landlady of the house where http://anidb.net/ch80775 [Elias] and http://anidb.net/ch80778 [Chise] reside. Originally a banshee, she is now silent and takes care of the housekeeping duties in the household. Her silence may be the reason they call her Silky rather than by her name.
Source: Wikipedia
name: Silky
